Siruk Pharmacy Feature tlangpui Demo of the app is available here

  1. - Inventory management: Damdawi chi hrang hrang ziah luhna a awm anga, heng damdawi te hi hlawm lian tak2 pathum (tablet, bottle, leh piece) anga thliar hran an ni.
  2. - Whole sale and reatail: Whole-sale leh retail tana hman theih tura buatsaih a ni.
  3. - Inventory detail update: Damdawi awm lo dah belhna te, damdawi thleng thar ziah belhna te a awm anga
  4. - Anonymous or buyer specific sales:Damdawi hralh apiangin, a leitu ziah luhna leh, a damdawi leh chhinchhiahna a awm anga
  5. - Daily Sales details:Hetiang atang hian nitin damdawi hralh dan chiang zawka en letna awm anga, nitina pawisa che vel chiang zawka tarlanin a awm bawk ang.
  6. - Handle returned items: Damdawi hralh tawh, thleng lehte chu invoice/receipt tih danglam theihin a awm ang.
SOFTWARE RENTING
  1. Write an email, or contact from HERE, my team will reach back to you within 48 hours. Or contact WHATSAPP SUPPORT.
  2. Pharmacy App will be available for testing, free trial period will be 3 months. However, once the app is confirmed, the billing of first year will include the trial period.
  3. The yearly subscription fee of the application is ₹1500.00
  4. NO REFUND IS AVAILABLE
